name: Austoria: The Militia
description:
Austoria: The Militia, proudly made by Scratchy Studios

Austoria: The Militia was developed in a program called SRPGStudio, and is similar to other strategy games like Fire Emblem.

This current demo is two chapters long (featuring two prologue chapters, one of which is only accessible by meeting certain gameplay conditions).  More chapters and content will be added alongside future updates.

The game takes place in the newly founded nation of Bristol, and follows the journey of Kaden, the young lord of Bristol. He and his group of volunteer soldiers will do whatever they can to protect their homeland. Together, they make up Bristol's militia.

This game is a work in progress. A variety of content and assets will need fixing and balancing. Please read the "Readme" text file for more information.

Follow the Austoria Twitter account!

Join the Austoria Discord server!

Latest version: 0.1.0
